DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine whether ulcerative colitis participant prefer delivery golimumab via prefilled syringe Smartject™ device .
DOC.brief_title: Preference Prefilled Syringe Smartject™ Device Delivering Golimumab Participants Suffering From Moderate-to-severe Ulcerative Colitis ( MK-8259-027 )
